name: National Honor Society (NHS)
description: The Windy City Chapter of the  National Honor Society (NHS) was established in 1978. Membership is awarded to students who demonstrate the four pillars: Scholarship, Leadership, Service and Character. Sophomore and Junior students who meet the eligibility criteria receive an invitation to apply as rising Juniors and Seniors.

announcements.title: Meetings
announcements.description: General Assembly meetings take place once a month in the Library.
